title: Google\Cloud\Sql\V1beta4\ReplicaConfiguration
name: ReplicaConfiguration
description:
Read-replica configuration for connecting to the primary instance.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.sql.v1beta4.ReplicaConfiguration

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.mysql_replica_configuration
params.description: MySQL specific configuration when replicating from a MySQL on-premises primary instance. Replication configuration information such as the username, password, certificates, and keys are not stored in the instance metadata. The configuration information is used only to set up the replication connection and is stored by MySQL in a file named master.info in the data directory.

params.name: data.failover_target
params.description:
Specifies if the replica is the failover target. If the field is set to true the replica will be designated as a failover replica. In case the primary instance fails, the replica instance will be promoted as the new primary instance.

Only one replica can be specified as failover target, and the replica has to be in different zone with the primary instance.

methods.description:
